name: Psychiatric Session Note (SOAP + AI Hybrid)
description: AI-assisted psychiatric progress note template based on SOAP, with clinical metadata and AI summary.

sections.title: Session Metadata
sections.instruction: Patient initials/ID, session date, provider, session type, duration (HIPAA-sensitive)

sections.title: AI Session Summary
sections.instruction: One-line takeaway and one-paragraph executive summary (AI-generated). Include confidence score.

sections.title: Subjective (S)
sections.instruction: Patient's self-reported mood, symptoms, sleep, appetite, stressors

sections.title: Objective (O)
sections.instruction: Observable findings: affect, speech, behavior, orientation, vitals if relevant

sections.title: Assessment (A)
sections.instruction: Diagnostic impression, risk assessment (SI/HI), progress vs treatment goals

sections.title: Plan (P)
sections.instruction: Interventions, medication changes, referrals, therapy tasks and follow-up

sections.title: Medications
sections.instruction: Current medications, doses, changes, and rationale

sections.title: Diagnoses (DSM/ICD)
sections.instruction: List diagnostic codes and working diagnosis

sections.title: Safety & Risk Management
sections.instruction: Safety plan, emergency contacts, hospitalization considerations

sections.title: Next Appointment
sections.instruction: Date, time and modality of next session

sections.title: Audit Trail
sections.instruction: Human review flag, reviewer name and timestamp, AI version
